name: Zareth Racing
description:
Help support me build games, by playing my games in development!

This project is for me to learn 3D game creation in Unity and may not see full development.

You play as cuberoot3, or "cubie" for short. 

This will be some kind of "Racing" RPG (role-playing game) hybrid.  Knowing me, more on the RPG side.

Current controls: Use arrow keys or thumbstick on controller to play.

No Sounds or Music yet
